summary: This bill, the 'Security And Fairness Enhancement for America Act of 2025,' aims to eliminate the diversity immigrant program. It amends the Immigration and Nationality Act by striking Section 203(c), which pertains to the diversity visa program. The bill also makes several technical and conforming amendments to various sections of the Act, including sections 101, 201, 203, 204, 214, 216, and 245. The changes are scheduled to take effect on October 1, 2025.
